articles.author: Kate Dennett
articles.title: Jack Grealish parties with TV star Chloe Chaloner at Wayne Lineker's Ibiza club - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Manchester City footballer, 26, was seen chatting with the Ibiza Weekender star as he spent another day partying in the sunshine at the Ocean Beach Club.
articles.content:
Jack Grealish partied with Chloe Chaloner at Wayne Lineker's club this week as he continued his boozy Ibiza trip following his team's Premier League title triumph.
